Package cams.camp

Class CampDetails

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.CampDetails
public class CampDetails
extends java.lang.Object
Store the details of a camp, including dates, location, and other attributes.

    • getFacultyRestriction

      public Faculty getFacultyRestriction()
      Retrieves the faculty that the camp is available to
      Returns:
      Enumeration of type Faculty; if ALL, the camp is unrestricted.

    • setFacultyRestriction

      public void setFacultyRestriction​(Faculty facultyRestriction)
      Sets the faculty that the camp is available to; all participants from other faculties are unable to join or view the camp
      Parameters:
      facultyRestriction - The faculty that the camp is available to (can be ALL)

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the camp is currently visible.

      Visibility determines whether the camp is viewable by potential participants.

      Returns:
      true if the camp is visible, false otherwise.

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility​(boolean visibility)
      Sets the visibility of the camp.
      Parameters:
      visibility - The visibility status to set for the camp.
